holidays.title: National Eat Your Vegetables Day
holidays.description: Whether you’re digging into a salad or trying kale for the first time, celebrate those veggies!

holidays.title: Take Your Cat to Work Day

holidays.title: Bunker Hill Day
holidays.description: Bunker Hill Day is a celebration of the sacrifices made by the heroes at Bunker Hill.

holidays.title: Commemoration of General Don Martín Miguel de Güemes
holidays.description: Martín Miguel de Güemes played a key role in the decisive triumphs during the Argentine Revolution.

holidays.title: Eid-e-Ghorban
holidays.description: To all of our Muslim brothers and sisters around the world, a happy Eid-e-Ghorban.

holidays.title: Gerald Day
holidays.description: Few people know these facts about the name Gerald. Let’s dive deep on Gerald Day!

holidays.title: Global Garbage Man Day
holidays.description: Celebrate Global Garbage Man Day by offering smiles and appreciation to these hard workers!

holidays.title: Iceland Independence Day
holidays.description: Iceland Independence Day is a celebration of the country’s freedom from Denmark.

holidays.title: Miguel de Guemes Day
holidays.description: Speak, recount, and honor the heroic deeds and life of Miguel de Güemes today.

holidays.title: National Apple Strudel Day
holidays.description: Take part in the sweet celebration of apple strudel on June 17.

holidays.title: National Dump the Pump Day
holidays.description: Let’s do our part for the environment and the future generations this Dump the Pump Day!

holidays.title: national harrison day
holidays.description: Find out more about this lovely Northern English name and its roots throughout history.

holidays.title: National Jan Day
holidays.description: Now we look at some famous Jans who made their mark in history.

holidays.title: National Mascot Day
holidays.description: Mascots bring luck, encourage participation, and make events more enjoyable for everyone.

holidays.title: National Mason Day
holidays.description: Today’s Masons may not work with stone but they’re still gifted at creating things.

holidays.title: national ralph day
holidays.description: There is so much to explore in a name! Let’s celebrate National Ralph Day.

holidays.title: National Stewart’s Root Beer Day
holidays.description: Grab a glass or two of Stewart’s root beer classics to honor the day.

holidays.title: Nursing Assistants Day
holidays.description: Let’s do our best and make this day extra special for our nursing assistants.

holidays.title: World Day to Combat Desertification and Drought
holidays.description: Take the chance to be a hero and join the fight to preserve our environment.

holidays.title: World Tessellation Day
holidays.description: Grab your tiles and prepare to analyze and unleash your creativity this World Tessellation Day.

holidays.title: Cristiano Ronaldo Jr.’s Birthday
holidays.description: Cristiano Ronaldo Jr., the son of a football legend, is a marvel to watch.

holidays.title: Kendrick Lamar’s Birthday
holidays.description: Here’s an exceptionally talented rapper who believes in lending his voice to relevant things.

holidays.title: KG Crown’s Birthday
holidays.description: K.G. Crown is a star with a promising future in the world of social media.

holidays.title: KJ Apa’s Birthday
holidays.description: K.J. Apa's characters have had vastly varied life situations, and he embodies them all admirably.

holidays.title: Lisa Mantler’s Birthday
holidays.description: There are no limits for this talented Instagram and TikTok Star, not even the sky!

holidays.title: Paulina Rubio’s Birthday

holidays.title: Venus Williams’s Birthday
holidays.description: Venus Williams is a professional tennis player who was home-coached by her father to universal stardom.
